title: My first font design ever
content:
Hello!

This is my first post here, and i would like to present my sans type design.

Some info: the font is considered to be a text font - i test it set&printed in 8-12 pt size. Only lowercase now, capitals and numerals are to come soon, but before that i want to see clearly how lowercase looks.

More images here: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/fabergraph/](http://web.archive.org/web/20090506122831/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/fabergraph/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/fabergraph/")

Could you let me what you know please? Any c&c are welcome! Thanks!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [FABER-sans\_második-kör\_kurrens\_1200.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090506122831/http:/typophile.com/files/FABER-sans_m%C3%A1sodik-k%C3%B6r_kurrens_1200.jpg) | 70.86 KB |
| [text\_test\_003\_3500.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090506122831/http:/typophile.com/files/text_test_003_3500.jpg) | 947.79 KB |
author: fabergraph

comments.content: Looks very interesting, but I’d need a PDF to be sure. And you might consider posting in the Critique forum, if you want critique.
